verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> In the second לְדָרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> in the sixth בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> Haggai הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <WH2216> unto Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <WH7597> of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <WH6346> governor יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> and to Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹצָדָ֛ק <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> the high לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> This people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> This אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> say לֹ֥א <WH3808> not עֶת־ <WH6256> The time בֹּ֛א <WH935> is not come עֶת־ <WH6256> the time בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD'S לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> should be built פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by חַגַּ֥י <WH2292> Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הַעֵ֤ת <WH6256> [Is it] time לָכֶם֙ אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> for you O ye to dwell בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֣ם <WH1004> houses סְפוּנִ֑ים <WH5603> in your cieled וְהַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> and this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this חָרֵֽב׃ <WH2720> desolate

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> heart עַל־ <WH5921> and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> your ways

זְרַעְתֶּ֨ם <WH2232> Ye have sown הַרְבֵּ֜ה <WH7235> much וְהָבֵ֣א <WH935> and bring מְעָ֗ט <WH4592> in little אָכ֤וֹל <WH398> ye eat וְאֵין־ <WH369> no לְשָׂבְעָה֙ <WH7654> but ye have not enough שָׁת֣וֹ <WH8354> ye drink וְאֵין־ <WH369> one לְשָׁכְרָ֔ה <WH7937> but ye are not filled with drink לָב֖וֹשׁ <WH3847> ye clothe וְאֵין־ <WH369> one לְחֹ֣ם <WH2527> you but there is none warm ל֑וֹ וְהַ֨מִּשְׂתַּכֵּ֔ר <WH7936> and he that earneth wages מִשְׂתַּכֵּ֖ר <WH7936> earneth wages אֶל־ <WH413> into צְר֥וֹר <WH6872> [to put it] into a bag נָקֽוּב׃ <WH5344> with holes פ

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> heart עַל־ <WH5921> and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> your ways

עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> Go up הָהָ֛ר <WH2022> to the mountain וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> and bring עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> wood וּבְנ֣וּ <WH1129> and build הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> the house וְאֶרְצֶה־ <WH7521> and I will take pleasure בּ֥וֹ [וְאֶכָּבֵד כ] (וְאֶכָּבְדָ֖ה <WH3513> abounding with ק) אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

פָּנֹ֤ה <WH6437> Ye looked אֶל־ <WH413> about הַרְבֵּה֙ <WH7235> for much וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold לִמְעָ֔ט <WH4592> and lo [it came] to little וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> and when ye brought הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> [it] home וְנָפַ֣חְתִּי <WH5301> I did blow ב֑וֹ יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because מֶ֗ה <WH4100> Why נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> upon it Why? saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because בֵּיתִי֙ <WH1004> of mine house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ה֣וּא <WH1931> he חָרֵ֔ב <WH2720> that [is] waste וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> of you רָצִ֖ים <WH7323> and ye run אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> unto his own house

עַל־ <WH5921> because כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> because כָּלְא֥וּ <WH3607> over you is stayed שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> Therefore the heaven מִטָּ֑ל <WH2919> from dew וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth כָּלְאָ֥ה <WH3607> is stayed יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH2981> [from] her fruit

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <WH7121> And I called חֹ֜רֶב <WH2721> for a drought עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon the land וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> and upon the mountains וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> and upon the corn וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> and upon the new wine וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַיִּצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> and upon the oil וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תּוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> bringeth forth הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> and upon [that] which the ground וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> and upon men וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and upon cattle וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְגִ֥יעַ <WH3018> and upon all the labour כַּפָּֽיִם׃ <WH3709> of the hands ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> obeyed זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <WH2216> Then Zerubbabel בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֡ל <WH7597> of Shealtiel וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹצָדָק֩ <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> the high וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> with all the remnant הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God וְעַל־ <WH5921> and דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> and the words חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> of Haggai הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after שְׁלָח֖וֹ <WH7971> had sent יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> did fear הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> him and the people מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> Then spake חַגַּ֞י <WH2292> Haggai מַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> messenger יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD'S בְּמַלְאֲכ֥וּת <WH4400> message יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> in the LORD'S לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for נְאֻם־ <WH5002> I [am] with you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיָּ֣עַר <WH5782> stirred up יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> רוּחַ֩ <WH7307> the spirit זְרֻבָּבֶ֨ל <WH2216> of Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֜ל <WH7597> of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <WH6346> governor יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> and the spirit יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> of Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹצָדָק֙ <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> the high וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> and the spirit כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> of all the remnant הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they came וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and did מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> work בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God פ

בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <WH702> In the four לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בַּשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <WH8345> of the sixth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> in the second לְדָרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king
